# Module: tf.contrib.integrate

Integration and ODE solvers.



Defined in [`contrib/integrate/__init__.py`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r1.14/tensorflow/contrib/integrate/__init__.py).

## Functions

[`odeint(...)`](../../tf/contrib/integrate/odeint): Integrate a system of ordinary differential equations.

[`odeint_fixed(...)`](../../tf/contrib/integrate/odeint_fixed): ODE integration on a fixed grid (with no step size control).
